channel.title: 405 ClientError: Method not allowed for url
channel.description:
for the below command: response = s.post('{}/api/queries/{}/results'.format(redash_url, query_id), json=body) i get the response status as 405. with the same url, api key, & query id works perfectly fine for /api/queries/<id> etc Also if i copy the entire url https://<redash_url>/api/queries/2938/results and put it in chrome, t will throw "it seems the page you are looking for cannot be found" but if me https://<redash_url>/api/queries/2938 is opened in chrome it works fine.
What can be done here?
Auto-User

item.title: 405 ClientError: Method not allowed for url
item.dc:creator: user123
item.description:
for the below command:
response = s.post(‘{}/api/queries/{}/results’.format(redash_url, query_id), json=body)
i get the response status as 405.
with the same url, api key, & query id works perfectly fine for /api/queries/ etc
Also if i copy the entire url https://<redash_url>/api/queries/2938/results and put it in chrome, t will throw “it seems the page you are looking for cannot be found” but if me https://<redash_url>/api/queries/2938 is opened in chrome it works fine.

What can be done here?

Auto-User

Read full topic
item.source: 405 ClientError: Method not allowed for url
